org.micromanager.api

Class PositionList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.micromanager.api.PositionList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PositionList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Navigation list of positions for the XYStage. Used for multi site acquisition support.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
